summary: A series of blog posts titled 'Ecosystem Architecture' explores a new practice designed to address the fragmentation of the internet. Inspired by various fields, this approach combines decentralization and regenerative design to transform digital fragments into seeds for a healthier, more vibrant digital future. The posts emphasize embracing imperfection and fostering healthier digital ecosystems.
excerpt: The fragmentation of the internet mirrors the physical world. Ecosystem architecture uses decentralization and regenerative design to turn these digital fragments into seeds for a better future.
